subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Much of the intrigue surrounding the Giants’ playoff game against the Eagles on Sunday is not simply from the result on the field, but from what it might do to the team’s and Coach Tom Coughlin's long-term future.
snippet: Much of the intrigue surrounding the Giants’ playoff game against the Eagles on Sunday is not simply from the result on the field, but from what it might do to the team’s and Coach Tom Coughlin's long-term future.
